skills.name: add
skills.description: Use to add a issue to a version OR create a new version (major/minor/patch)

skills.name: cleanup
skills.description: Use when session crashed or locks blocking - cleans abandoned worktrees, lock files, and orphaned branches

skills.name: config
skills.description: Interactive wizard to customize your CAT settings

skills.name: help
skills.description: Use for quick reference to all CAT commands and skills

skills.name: init
skills.description: Initialize CAT planning structure (new or existing project)

skills.name: learn
skills.description: > MANDATORY: Use after ANY mistake to record learning, perform RCA, and implement prevention. Integrates token tracking for context-related failures.

skills.name: monitor-subagents
skills.description: Check status of running subagents including token usage and context limits

skills.name: optimize-execution
skills.description: Use after complex issues to analyze session efficiency and generate optimization recommendations

skills.name: research
skills.description: Research how to implement a issue before planning

skills.name: run-retrospective
skills.description: MANDATORY after learn threshold - analyzes patterns and derives action items

skills.name: shrink-doc
skills.description: > Use to reduce Claude-facing document size while maintaining execution equivalence. Validates with /compare-docs to ensure no semantic loss.

skills.name: status
skills.description: Display project progress - versions, issues, and completion status

skills.name: work
skills.description: Work on or resume issues - use when user says "work on", "resume", "continue", or "pick up" a task
